text: melova jivitaye upamava vanuye ahasin api pahala kala jalaya meni. evita minisun ha govipala satun aharayata ganna dæyin mahapolove æti pælæti e samanga musu veyi. mahapolova ehi sarusaravat bhavaya gena eya alamkaravat veyi. ehi væsiyo niyata vasayenma e mata taman balaya darannan bava sitati. (evita) ratriye ho dahavale apage niyogaya e veta pæminiyeya. pasu va eya nelanu læbu palu bhumiyak bavata api eya pat kalemu. eya peradina kisidu prayojanayak nogattak men viya. vataha ganna janayata mema vadan api pæhædili karanuye melesaya
